itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping White Cedar Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: White Cedar Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Mediah Northern Highlands and Elric Shrine. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering White Cedar Trees.

item.name: White Cedar Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping White Cedar Timber.

item.name: White Cedar Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping White Cedar Timber.

item.name: Wagon Registration: White Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <White Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 12, Acceleration: 110%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 120%, Braking: 120%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Mediah Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 5 Acacia Plywood and 5 White Cedar Plywood.

item.name: White Wagon Cover
item.desc:
A cover for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Sturdy White Cedar Plywood
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and White Cedar Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Mediahn Handcrafted Bedside Table
item.desc: A handcrafted bedside table from Mediah.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Mediahn Handcrafted Drawers
item.desc: A handcrafted drawer from Mediah.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Mediahn Handcrafted Closet
item.desc: A handcrafted wardrobe from Mediah.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Mediahn Handcrafted Table
item.desc: A handcrafted table from Mediah.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Mediahn Handcrafted Dining Table
item.desc: A handcrafted dining table from Mediah.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Ship License: Mediah Ferry
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Mediah Ferry> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 8, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
